item.title: When chatbots feel human
item.description: A couple of months ago I wrote my first blog as a reflection on AI. This second piece continues that exploration, this time focusing on the part that fascinates (and unsettles) me most: the feeling that chatbots are becoming human. In my work, I encounter AI on a daily basisâ€”not just in the tools and technologies we use, but also in the enthusiasm of people who work with it. At the same time, I see a stark contrast in my personal life.
